text: Ok I've got the mailer sending me mail, with the html from the template. ics generator is not yet finished, but super simple to do. I do have a question for <@U04JZANJF>: since CSS in email is apparently super behind-the-times, could we look into using a solution like Mail Chimp?
Just had a chat with Gaston about MailChimp. Apparently I can get a free account and use their tools to make the email template
then we can send that template with our existing mail sender
